sampleDescriptions: FY 2019 NDAA Language to Require the DOD to Establish a Chain of Command for IoT Technologies Linked to Defense Facility Energy Management
FY 2019 NDAA Language to Require the DOD to Establish a Chain of Command for IoT Technologies Linked to Defense Facility Energy Management
Establishing a statutory command/control protocol within the DOD to address IoT testing and implementation.
Develop DOD policy support for a new pilot program that tests cybersecure IOT industrial controls to defense installations that leverage the public utility power grid.
